comment.author: Joelle
comment.text: I believe in every word Donald Trump says..... He has spoken like a true President. ☆☆☆☆☆☆ Lets help Donald Trump make this great nation great again. If you are not for Donald Trump, you are against America!!!!! Its that simple!

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: No I am for the united states thats why im against trump. Its also why against hillary. Spoken like a true president. He speaks like a 4th grader
